DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety effectiveness SPD465 treatment ADHD . The study also look SPD465 affect sleep .
DOC.brief_title: Safety SPD465 Treating Adults With ADHD .
DOC.criteria: Subject satisfy entry criterion antecedent protocol ( SPD465301 SPD465303 ) complete minimum 4 7 week doubleblind treatment without experience clinically significant adverse event . Subject must male nonpregnant female agree comply use acceptable contraceptive method . Subject terminate antecedent protocol ( SPD465301 SPD465303 ) noncompliance and/or experience serious adverse event adverse event result termination protocol . Comorbid psychiatric diagnosis significant symptom Axis II disorder severe Asix I disorder . History seizure , tic disorder , current diagnosis and/or family history Tourette 's Disorder . Females pregnant lactating .
